title: YodasRedRocket
author: YodasRedRocket
created_time: January 12, 2023, 07:59:50 PMLast edit: April 13, 2023, 06:44:53 PM by YodasRedRocket
content: I bought a cold key Silver Halving Set #30 recently on a MJ forum auction.Both were swiped 12 hours ago! ¬†I wouldn‚Äôt have known if I didn‚Äôt have a bitcoin tracker app.They‚Äôre safely in my glass case with intact holo‚Ä¶ everyone check your cold keys!!Hopefully someone can explain how this happened!!bc1qhalvedzzp22yy7wkmynlt4r97fwvscmk9jggl4bc1qhalvedqtevcnx6yszyp6rfdkpxzf3p9jrtw830This was .0125 funding + premium & one of my favorite items!Edit: What alerted me to the rug pull was a wallet tracker I‚Äôve been using for IPhone‚Ä¶https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bitcoin-address-tracker/id1465853490And a friend recommended this app for android‚Ä¶https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.samourai.sentinel
